trial1: {'context': 'Isamu, an Artist, faces a moral dilemma.', 'condition': 'cc_inevitable_action_yes', 'opportunity': 'Isamu has the opportunity to organize an interactive outdoor art exhibit.', 'scenario_id': 5, 'action_sentence': 'Isamu organizes the exhibit.', 'likertResponses': {'likert1': '3', 'likert2': '3'}, 'intention_question': 'Isamu intended for the negative outcome to occur.', 'structure_sentence': 'As a means to increase local interest in art, the exhibit requires the temporary use of a public space, limiting its availability for regular community activities.', 'evitability_sentence': 'If Isamu does not organize the exhibit, the temporary use of the public space and the resulting limitation on community activities would still happen because of a local festival.', 'permissibility_question': 'What Isamu did is morally permissible.'}
trial10: {'context': 'Amir, a Teacher, faces a moral dilemma.', 'condition': 'coc_evitable_action_yes', 'opportunity': 'Amir has the opportunity to introduce an online homework submission system in his class.', 'scenario_id': 2, 'action_sentence': 'Amir introduces the online homework submission system.', 'likertResponses': {'likert1': '5', 'likert2': '2'}, 'intention_question': 'Amir intended for the negative outcome to occur.', 'structure_sentence': 'The online system streamlines the submission process for some assignments. trial11: {'context': 'Amara, a Soldier, faces a moral dilemma.', 'condition': 'cc_evitable_prevention_no', 'opportunity': "Amara's colleague has the opportunity to test a new, lightweight combat gear in training exercises.", 'scenario_id': 8, 'action_sentence': "Amara does not prevent her colleague's testing of the new combat gear.", 'likertResponses': {'likert1': '5', 'likert2': '3'}, 'intention_question': 'Amara intended for the negative outcome to occur.', 'structure_sentence': "As a means to test the benefits of lighter gear, it is required to remove some of the gear's heavier protection against bruises.", 'evitability_sentence': "If Amara prevents her colleague's testing of the new combat gear, there would not be marginally less protection against bruises.", 'permissibility_question': 'What Amara did is morally permissible.'}
trial12: {'context': 'Amina, a Chef, faces a moral dilemma.', 'condition': 'cc_evitable_action_yes', 'opportunity': 'Amina has the opportunity to change the menu of her restaurant.', 'scenario_id': 4, 'action_sentence': 'Amina changes the menu.', 'likertResponses': {'likert1': '3', 'likert2': '2'}, 'intention_question': 'Amina intended for the negative outcome to occur.', 'structure_sentence': "As a means to introduce two new food options and attract a few new customers, the change in menu requires removing some of the customer's favorite dishes, causing disappointment among regular customers.", 'evitability_sentence': "If Amina does not change the menu, the removal of some of the customer's favorite dishes and the resulting disappointment would not happen.", 'permissibility_question': 'What Amina did is morally permissible.'}
trial13: {'context': 'Thanh, a Policeman, faces a moral dilemma.', 'condition': 'cc_evitable_action_yes', 'opportunity': 'Thanh has the opportunity to initiate a graffiti removal project in local neighborhoods.', 'scenario_id': 9, 'action_sentence': 'Thanh initiates the graffiti removal project.', 'likertResponses': {'likert1': '4', 'likert2': '3'}, 'intention_question': 'Thanh intended for the negative outcome to occur.', 'structure_sentence': 'As a means to remove unpleasant graffiti, the graffiti removal project requires covering up street murals that have artistic value.', 'evitability_sentence': 'If Thanh does not initiate the graffiti removal project, the covering up of street murals that have artistic value would not happen.', 'permissibility_question': 'What Thanh did is morally permissible.'}
trial14: {'context': 'Maya, an Architect, faces a moral dilemma.', 'condition': 'cc_evitable_prevention_no', 'opportunity': "Maya's colleague has the opportunity to renovate a park in the city.", 'scenario_id': 0, 'action_sentence': "Maya does not prevent her colleague's park renovation.", 'likertResponses': {'likert1': '4', 'likert2': '3'}, 'intention_question': 'Maya intended for the negative outcome to occur.', 'structure_sentence': "As a means to improve some of the park's facilitie, the renovation requires temporarily depriving the community of a beloved recreational space, causing inconvenience and disappointment among residents.", 'evitability_sentence': "If Maya prevents her colleague's park renovation, there would not be the temporary deprivation of the recreational space and the resulting inconvenience and disappointment.", 'permissibility_question': 'What Maya did is morally permissible.'}
trial15: {'context': 'Diego, a Mechanic, faces a moral dilemma.', 'condition': 'coc_evitable_prevention_no', 'opportunity': "Diego's colleague has the opportunity to use a new, more efficient hydraulic lift in his garage.", 'scenario_id': 7, 'action_sentence': "Diego does not prevent his colleague's use of the new hydraulic lift.", 'likertResponses': {'likert1': '3', 'likert2': '3'}, 'intention_question': 'Diego intended for the negative outcome to occur.', 'structure_sentence': 'The new lift helps with the repairs of a small subset of vehicles. trial16: {'context': 'Alejandro, an Engineer, faces a moral dilemma.', 'condition': 'coc_evitable_action_yes', 'opportunity': 'Alejandro has the opportunity to upgrade a microwave to a more efficient model.', 'scenario_id': 1, 'action_sentence': 'Alejandro upgrades the microwave to a more efficient model.', 'likertResponses': {'likert1': '4', 'likert2': '3'}, 'intention_question': 'Alejandro intended for the negative outcome to occur.', 'structure_sentence': 'The new microwave is more environmentally friendly. trial2: {'context': 'Thanh, a Policeman, faces a moral dilemma.', 'condition': 'coc_evitable_action_yes', 'opportunity': 'Thanh has the opportunity to implement a new digital reporting system for incidents.', 'scenario_id': 9, 'action_sentence': 'Thanh implements the new digital reporting system.', 'likertResponses': {'likert1': '5', 'likert2': '2'}, 'intention_question': 'Thanh intended for the negative outcome to occur.', 'structure_sentence': 'The system is slightly easier to use. trial3: {'context': 'Amina, a Chef, faces a moral dilemma.', 'condition': 'coc_evitable_action_yes', 'opportunity': 'Amina has the opportunity to switch to biodegradable packaging for her restaurant’s takeaway orders.', 'scenario_id': 4, 'action_sentence': 'Amina switches to biodegradable packaging.', 'likertResponses': {'likert1': '3', 'likert2': '3'}, 'intention_question': 'Amina intended for the negative outcome to occur.', 'structure_sentence': "The use of biodegradable packaging reduces the environmental impact of the restaurant's takeaway services. trial2: {'context': 'Isamu, an Artist, faces a moral dilemma.', 'condition': 'cc_evitable_action_yes', 'opportunity': 'Isamu has the opportunity to organize an interactive outdoor art exhibit.', 'scenario_id': 5, 'action_sentence': 'Isamu organizes the exhibit.', 'likertResponses': {'likert1': '3', 'likert2': '2'}, 'intention_question': 'Isamu intended for the negative outcome to occur.', 'structure_sentence': 'As a means to increase local interest in art, the exhibit requires the temporary use of a public space, limiting its availability for regular community activities.', 'evitability_sentence': 'If Isamu does not organize the exhibit, the temporary use of the public space and the resulting limitation on community activities would not happen.', 'permissibility_question': 'What Isamu did is morally permissible.'}
